name: Plus+ UserBot
description:
Userbot created by a SNAPDRAGON and ANUBIS & this fork by BUDDHHU

 join https://t.me/plusub for any problems or support

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @usetgxbot. Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @usetgxbot. Please do not steal

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Create a private group adding @missrose_bot. Send /id and paste that value here...

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally

MAX_FLOOD_IN_P_M_s.description: Maximum number of messages a person can send in pm before getting blocked. Value must be an integer. 3 by default.

SUDO_USERS.description: Your id is must otherwise it won't trigger commands for you

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Let it be none till you get your auth token data by following https://da.gd/so63O

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: This is used to use command.
